234a91a08ddc50df9f6981aa4fc31c20 (19:34): what i can do for resolve it?
51f7ed43858cd2419f1b5359a7763eb9 (19:34): gles: compile the .java-source, and place the result (.class-file) into WEB-INF/classes/path_to_package/..
51f7ed43858cd2419f1b5359a7763eb9 (19:35): gles: The Java Tutorial contains all information you need to get started.
51f7ed43858cd2419f1b5359a7763eb9 (19:36): gles: i don't know your textpad, but i've never seen a "textpad" being capable of compiling anything:)
